CustomField.description: In the case of an error, the contents of the error message are stored here for troubleshooting purposes and display to the user. To fully reset a step, this field must be cleared.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the case of an error, the contents of the error message are stored here for troubleshooting purposes and display to the user. To fully reset a step, this field must be cleared.
CustomField.label: Error Message
